name: Pop Delight
description:
Entry to Clicker Jam Spring 2023

by Cinna

Theme: Another Direction

Click on bubbles and you can redirect them to go into Another Direction.

After redirected the bubble must hit another bubble for you to gain currency towards upgrades (Green circle down below as it lights up) which allows you to score even higher.

With each click on a bubble you lose one click, but if the bubble hits another you gain the click back. If you run out of clicks it's Game Over.

Game made in 3 hours.

In addition to the browser version I've supplied you with a downloadable version for Windows as well.

Screenshots on itch.io aren't working for me..

For some reason the browser version doesn't have the cool gradient background that I included in the game, but otherwise seems to work alright.

The downloadable version has better visuals sadly.
